original_title: The People's House: Inside the White House with Barack and Michelle Obama
overview: The People's House: Inside the White House with Barack and Michelle ObamaÂ (2017)  Felix & Paul Studios  The People's House takes you on a historic visit to President Barack Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama's White House. Through the transportive power of VR, the Obamas take you on an intimate journey inside the West Wing, Executive and Private Residences, reflecting on their time there, and recounting the building's profound history since its creation over two centuries ago.
title: The People's House: Inside the White House with Barack and Michelle Obama
